SummaryEnglish: The gag comedy story centers on a bar in Sapporo's North 24th neighborhood, five stations away from the Susukino business district. There, the bar's proprietor, junior proprietor, odd regular customers, and its share of walk-ins recount their strange lives.

1.TitleEnglish: Let's Stay Together / I Ain't Gonna Stand for It / God's Gift to the World
1.SummaryEnglish: In Hokkaido, a man wanders into a bar named Snack Basue. His first snack bar experience becomes a night to remember when he meets the two eccentric ladies who run the place. Along with other patrons, they willingly (or not) discuss what's on their minds.

2.TitleEnglish: Come Rain or Come Shine / Sweet Baby / Still Waiting
2.SummaryEnglish: The ladies at the snack bar planned on interviewing two new hires—a girl named Kosame and a robber?! With trouble at hand, will they be able to handle this one? With passionate talks of princes on white horses, etc., it's another fun night at Snack Basue.

3.TitleEnglish: You're Still My Brother / As the Years Go Passing By / Try Me
3.SummaryEnglish: Two men walk into the snack bar, and what do they find? A murder scene?! Has Akemi had enough of her boss's shenanigans?! Find out, with talks of the past and secret techniques to follow! Another lively night at Snack Basue.

4.TitleEnglish: There Is Love / If I Should Die Tonight / Soul Shadows
4.SummaryEnglish: Love is in the air as the men of the snack bar dare to ask the difficult question: What is Akemi's type?! With the stresses of life eating away at the patrons' souls, it's a good opportunity to find out if you see it too!

5.TitleEnglish: Get on the Good Foot / Talkin` Loud and Saying Nothin` / My Funny Valentine
5.SummaryEnglish: Azuma is back to impress the ladies through palm reading written by none other than Love Guru Douglas Hamada?! The night goes on as Valentine's day chocolate is given and smack talk is served, making it another lively night!

6.TitleEnglish: Hello Stranger / What a Wonderful World / As / Mean Old World
6.SummaryEnglish: Come on a journey as Snack Basue dives into the world of fantasy and games. New but recognizable customers join the gang as the night heats up in debate and apologies are given to publishing companies. Fishing and reunions also to come!

7.TitleEnglish: Closer / What a Fool Believes / God Blessed Our Love
7.SummaryEnglish: The night opens as Morita tries to string Yamada along as his virgin buddy, though Yamada claims he's not. Will the salary man be able to prove it?! Come walk down memory lane as the patrons talk of their past struggles and enjoy a good glass or ten.

8.TitleEnglish: None Of Us Are Free / In The Midnight Hour / Twinkle Twinkle Little Me / Angel
8.SummaryEnglish: Akemi has a new challenge on her hands as baddies crowd the bar. Will she have good advice for these evil commanders? Tonight, skills will be tested and regrets will be born as the hostess and junior hostess serve another odd crowd!

9.TitleEnglish: Release Yourself／Bad, Bad Whiskey／Can't Get Any Harder
9.SummaryEnglish: Morita lives a certain ascetic life. He seems to believe that he can become a handsome man through abstinence. Akemi questions Morita's foolishness, and Tatsu-nii watches over her kindly. Other than that, let's talk about sake. Now, let's talk about true strength.

10.TitleEnglish: Friend To Friend / Wednesday Night / Only Sixteen
10.SummaryEnglish: To make a friend or not to make a friend, that is the question this week at our lovely run-down snack bar. Find out whose point is superior and meet the new customers who drop in this time! Grab a drink and listen in on tonight's shenanigans.

11.TitleEnglish: Under The Cherry Moon / Adult Education / Solitude
11.SummaryEnglish: Heated debates stir up the snack bar this week as Akemi goes head-to-head with her patrons. Who will you side with, and are the topics worth debating? Grab a drink and come decide for yourself at Snack Basue!

12.TitleEnglish: The Great Pretender / Let Me Into Your World / Trouble Man
12.SummaryEnglish: Welcome home, dear viewer, as you're greeted by a new face tonight. Meet Misawa, Akemi's friend! How will she react when she meets Morita for the first time? Find out in tonight's episode of lies and manhood.

13.TitleEnglish: Risen' To the Top / Just One Look
13.SummaryEnglish: In this final week, join the patrons one last time as Akemi reaches new heights of ridiculousness involving inappropriate words. So pick up a glass and enjoy the run-down snack bar as you de-stress, engage, and sing along!
